description: Grade 12 / Senior High Year 3 (Gaokao Preparation & Mastery)
curriculum_standard: Based on 2022/2017 National Curriculum Standards (Gaokao Requirements)

topic_coverage.summary: Focus on comprehensive application, exam-specific formats, and deep cultural expression.

categories.name: Category 1: Practical Writing (Gaokao Focus)
example_prompts: A Speech at the Graduation Ceremony
An Application Letter for the Asian Games Volunteers
A Letter of Advice to a Freshman

categories.name: Category 2: Continuation Writing (Narrative)
sub_topics: Story Completion (Based on a reading passage)
Acts of Kindness (Helping strangers, Rescue stories)
example_prompts: Continue the Story: The Unexpected Gift
Continue the Story: A Rescue in the Storm

categories.name: Category 3: Chinese Culture & Responsibility (Man & Society)
sub_topics: Introducing China (Tea, Kung Fu, Festivals, History)
Traditional Values (Filial piety, Honesty, Hard work)

vocabulary.level_requirement: Proficiency in 3500+ words. Idiomatic and precise expression.

complex_structures: Paraphrasing skills (Changing sentence structures for better flow)
grammar_focus.sentence_variety: Rhythmic variation of long and short sentences. Masterful use of transitions.

writing_standards.structure: Highly structured and coherent. Practical: Format is crucial. Narrative: Plot logical flow.
writing_standards.cohesion: Natural and smooth transitions. 'Li Hua' style appropriateness.
writing_standards.scoring_points: Task fulfillment, coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range and accuracy.
